sentences.en: ‘You sold the car?’ she asked, incredulous.
sentences.cn: “你把车卖了？”她难以置信地问道。

sentences.en: "He made you do it?" Her voice was incredulous.
sentences.cn: “他强迫你做的？”她的语气里带着怀疑。

sentences.en: After I told her the story, Jane gave me an incredulous smile.
sentences.cn: 我把这个故事讲给简听,听完后她不相信地朝我一笑.

sentences.en: Elizabeth looked at her sister incredulous solicitude, but said nothing.
sentences.cn: 伊丽莎白半信半疑而又极其关切地望着姐姐, 一声不响.

sentences.en: Emil looked incredulous , but he did not dispute the point.
sentences.cn: 爱尔尔似乎不信, 但也没开口反驳.

sentences.en: Frantically, phoned the hotel. The clerk was incredulous and a bit aloof.
sentences.cn: 我心急火燎地给饭店打电话,旅馆职员有点不相信,漫不经心.

sentences.en: He has an incredible mind, he's always incredulous of hearsay.
sentences.cn: 他有着令人难以置信的头脑, 他不相信道听途说.

sentences.en: Her laughter was so unaffected, so incredulous, that the officers were impressed.
sentences.cn: 她笑得那么自然, 表现得那么不相信迈克尔杀人的事.

sentences.en: His face darkened, and he looked at her in incredulous horror.
sentences.cn: 他变了脸色, 带着半信半疑的讨厌的神气望着她.

sentences.en: I am wholly incredulous of the truth of his story.
sentences.cn: 我根本不相信他说的是真话.

sentences.en: Inspector Kelsey looked still more incredulous.
sentences.cn: 凯尔西巡官对此显得越发难以置信.

sentences.en: Kastner was incredulous and sought to dismiss Gauss.
sentences.cn: 卡斯特纳不相信并且企图赶走高斯.

sentences.en: Manfred : [ incredulous ] You rattling conceive shes the woman for me?
sentences.cn: 曼狄尼 ( 怀疑地 ): 你真认为她是适合我的女孩?

sentences.en: She gave me an incredulous glance.
sentences.cn: 她表示怀疑地向我瞥了一眼.

sentences.en: With an effort I managed to restrain my incredulous laughter.
sentences.cn: 我好不容易才忍住不笑出来,因为他的话令人难以置信.

trans.tran_en: unable or unwilling to believe something
